name: WorkflowMax
tag_list: ad-agency-software, practice-management-software, job-management-software, online-job-management-software, workflow-project-management, workflow-management-tool, job-tracking-software, team-collaboration-tools, web-based-task-management-software, workflow
overview:
WorkflowMax is an online Job Management Solution.

The software provides a tool for small to medium sized, service focused companies to manage their jobs, projects, time, quotes and invoices in one streamlined, highly intutive application

WorkflowMax has a strong uptake in the Web Design, Software, Creative, IT Services and Architectural industries.

Working closely with major accounting and payroll applications, WorkflowMax provides a seamless integration from front end operations through to back end accounting services.
